description:
Numerous cases where animal youkai are getting abducted and having their fur shaved off occur! Mamekichi, Tamao, and Hatanaka also disappear so Haruaki and Sano try to save them. Will Haruaki be able to save his furry friends in this mysterious case?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Au secours, Seimei ! L`affaire des enlèvements de yokai animaux !
Save Me, Seimei-kun! The Case of the Animal Youkai Abductions!!
Tasukete Seimei-kun! Doubutsu Youkai Yuukai Jiken!!
助けて晴明君! 動物妖怪誘拐事件!!
